title: Do i have to get the k/da orb
body: i wanted to get the lane orb for bot lane but then the k/da orb came along and i cant get the other orbs. Will there be any more orbs later i can buy with worlds tokens or do i buy the k/da orb?

replies.body:
Yeah the other orbs are coming back later, I think the exact date is November 16, 2018, but I'm not 100%
Check this link: https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-worlds-season-2018-event
I can't find it in here but I'm not looking hard enough

The OCE page was missing the info when it went up, was fixed for a while, but is now missing the information again, so here it is from the NA page (you'll have to convert timezones):

>Also returns November 16, 2018 at 8:00 a.m. PT â€“ November 19, 2018 at 11:59 p.m. PT
